timeSeriesQuery.prometheusQuery:
(
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster="${cluster.value}", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="${namespace.value}", persistentvolumeclaim="${volume.value}"})
  -
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{cluster="${cluster.value}", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="${namespace.value}", persistentvolumeclaim="${volume.value}"})
)

sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{cluster="${cluster.value}", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="${namespace.value}", persistentvolumeclaim="${volume.value}"})

sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_inodes_used{cluster="${cluster.value}", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="${namespace.value}", persistentvolumeclaim="${volume.value}"})

(
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_inodes{cluster="${cluster.value}", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="${namespace.value}", persistentvolumeclaim="${volume.value}"})
  -
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_inodes_used{cluster="${cluster.value}", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="${namespace.value}", persistentvolumeclaim="${volume.value}"})
)
